import React, { Component } from 'react' import FeatureImg from '../feature-img/FeatureImg' import Text from '../text/text' import Textsecond from '../text/textsecond' import TextThird from '../text/textThird' import Maindash from '../text-feature/maindash' class Editor extends Component { state={ img:null, textFirst:null, textsecond:null, textThird:null } selectedimg=(img)=>{ this.setState({ ...this.state, img:img }) } FirstTextItem=(e)=>{ this.setState({ ...this.state, textFirst:e.target.value }) } secondTextItem=(e)=>{ this.setState({ ...this.state, textsecond:e.target.value }) } thirdTextItem=(e)=>{ this.setState({ ...this.state, textThird:e.target.value }) } render() { console.log(this.state.textThird) return (

{this.state.textFirst}

{this.state.textsecond}

{this.state.textThird}

) } } export default Editor
